sentences.sentence: Though the city will no longer clamp cars, illegally parked vehicles will be towed.
sentences.translation: 尽管该城将不再锁扣车辆，违规停放的车辆将被拖走。

sentences.sentence: Our car was towed away by the police.
sentences.translation: 我们的汽车被警察拖走了。

sentences.sentence: Each state barge was towed by a tender.
sentences.translation: 每只御艇都由一艘差船拖运。
